paper_title.en: Electrochemiluminescence Oxalic Acid Sensor Having a Platinum Electrode Coated with a Ru(II) Complex-Modified Chitosan (共著)
Substrate selectivity of an electrochemiluminescence Pt electrode coated with a Ru(bpy)(3)(2+)-modified chitosan silica gel membrane

description.en: The substrate selectivity of the known Ru(bpy)(3)(2+) electrochemiluminescence (ECL) is changed by coating a Pt working electrode with a Ru(bpy)(3)(2+)-modified chitosan membrane and successively with a silica gel membrane that was prepared by the sol-gel method using tetramethoxysilane as a precursor. The double coating resulted in a high selectivity toward oxalic acid at pH 6.8, lowering relative ECL responses to trimethylamine, proline and 4-hydroxyproline about 2.8, 3.4 and 3.8 times, respectively, compared to those obtained with a Pt electrode coated singly with the modified chitosan.
